field.name: member_id
field.query: SELECT member.id, CONCAT(member.id, ' - ', user.name) AS value FROM #__swa_member AS member LEFT JOIN #__users AS user ON user.id = member.user_id ORDER BY member.id DESC
field.label: Member

field.name: season_id
field.query: SELECT id, year FROM #__swa_season ORDER BY id DESC
field.label: Season

field.name: paid
field.description: Has the Member paid for SWA Membership for the Season?
field.label: Paid

field.name: level
field.description: What windsurfing level is the Member?
field.label: Level

field.name: uni_id
field.description: What University does the Member go to?
field.query: SELECT id, name FROM #__swa_university ORDER BY name ASC
field.label: University

field.name: approved
field.description: Has the Member been accepted into the University club (must be covered by club insurance)?
field.label: Approved

field.name: committee
field.description: What, if any, committee position is the Member?
field.label: Committee
